response.original_title: Liberty X- Just a little Live
response.overview: : Just a Little may have its shortcomings as a concert DVD, but the disc's layout is excellent. Featuring an array of specially recorded material, each of the sub-menus are personally introduced by a member of the band. The Who Wants to be a Millionaire-style quiz has exclusive footage of the band up for grabs if all ten of the randomly generated questions are answered correctly, while the behind-the-scenes feature provides a unique insight into the origins and success of the band.
response.title: Liberty X- Just a little Live
